Class EncapsulationAlgorithmPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.GUIPanel
              • view.EncapsulationAlgorithmPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

     class EncapsulationAlgorithmPanel
extends GUIPanel
    GUI panel that displays the list of scored algorithms, and a description about the algorithms and their score.

        public void setSelectedAlgorithm(AbstractAlgorithm selectedAlgorithm)

      • updateAlgorithmList

        protected void updateAlgorithmList()
        This method will ask for the high score of the currently selected user scenario, and be able to display the algorithms with their corresponding distances. The colouriser ensures that non-usable algorithms will be displayed in red.
